record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 9:30 A.M. TOMORROW
record.narrative:
ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 9:30 A.M. TOMORROW -- (Senate - May 01, 2008)

[Page: S3733]

speaking.paragraph: If there is no further business to come before the Senate, I ask unanimous consent the Senate stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 7:33 p.m., adjourned until Friday, May 2, 2008, at 9:30 a.m.
